name: Rabbids Travel in Time 3D
description:
Raving Rabbids Travel in Time is a hilarious 3D platform-adventure game where rabbids travel back in time to the greatest historical moments and mess them up.

Customize your Rabbid with close to 40 wacky costumes, from Cowboy to Roman. Jump, kick enemies and break blocks through colorful 3D jungles, desserts and castles in over 60 levels. Play in 3D environments in the greatest moments in history like Egypt and Rome. Easy game to pick up and play for everyone! 2-D / 3-D side-scrolling representation makes it easy to play for instant fun for kids and adults. Three unique game modes offer variety: story mode, time-attack, and challenge mode.
